member.name: T:Emergent.Toolbench.Search.UI.FindInTextBox.FindInTextBox
member.summary: When attached to a TextBox, handles the "Find" feature (Ctrl+F, F3, Ctrl+F3, Shift+F3, Shift+Ctrl+F3)

member.summary: Determines whether the specified character can be considered as part or a word.
member.returns: true if the character can be considered to be part of a word; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Emergent.Toolbench.Search.UI.FindInTextBox.FindInTextBox.GetCurrentWord(System.Windows.Controls.TextBox,System.Int32@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Gets the start and end indexes of the word at the current caret position, if any.
member.param: The start index of the word.
The end index of the word.
member.returns: true if there is a word at the current caret position and selStart/selEnd have been set accordingly; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Emergent.Toolbench.Search.UI.FindInTextBox.FindInTextBox.GetCurrentWord(System.Windows.Controls.TextBox)
member.summary: Gets the word at the current caret position.
member.returns: The word at the current caret position.

member.summary: Selects the word at the current caret position.
